byline.contributor: David R. Jones and Dalia Sussman contributed reporting from New York.

abstract: Unprecedented mayoral runoff election in Chicago has exposed surprising level of political vulnerability for Mayor Rahm Emanuel, despite fact that he won by decisive margin; remains to be seen whether Emanuel's new, humbler tone will have lasting place in his second term.
lead_paragraph: Even given a decisive margin of victory in Tuesday’s election, the episode has raised a sense of vulnerability around the mayor’s political career.

headline.main: Chicago Is Waiting to See if Runoff Battle Has Humbled Rahm Emanuel
headline.print_headline: Chicago Is Waiting to See if Runoff Battle Has Humbled Its Mayor

snippet: Even given a decisive margin of victory in Tuesday’s election, the episode has raised a sense of vulnerability around the mayor’s political career.
